name: Superstorm
description:
Superstorm is a case of Katamari meets Rampage – starting out as a small dervish in a back yard, you play as an ever-growing tornado. To begin with, you grow by picking up flowerbeds and trash cans, and as you grow, you switch flowerbeds for trees and trash cans for cars. This game brings the city-breaker genre back to the market, with all the stress-relieving goodness that follows destroying a city.

This game is developed by a small team of student as a school project, expect some bugs and problems.
